question: 西暦
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>West</kanji>'s <kanji>calendar</kanji> shows the history and time period of "The West." To the Japanese and Chinese, this era is known as the <vocabulary>Christian Era</vocabulary>. It also used to be used as a way to refer to the <vocabulary>Western Calendar</vocabulary>, though we usually just say <ja>カレンダー</ja> nowadays.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
